colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B KHRO BO RGYAL PO SME BA BRTZEGS PA'I SGO NAS GRIB SEL BYA TSUL BDUD RDZI'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD LDAN DGE TSUL BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GIS DPE RNYING BYANG KHA GSAL MI 'DUG PA GCIG YOD 'DI DAG BCOS AE RUNG ZHES 'DRI BAR RTEN, ,BYUNG NA BAN BON GYI DPE SNGA MA DES MCHOG MOD, ,'ON KYANG BSKUL PA PO'I 'DOD LTAR, TSIG DON NOR 'KHRUL LAS GZHUNG SNGA MA'I DGONGS PA SOR BZHAG TU BYAS NAS SHAR MAR SPEL TE, CHAGS MDO THANG PA SMAN RIN PA 'BOD PA'I RIG 'DZIN MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I BU BLO BZANG @019A *, ,DKON MCHOG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS DAG BCOS BGYIS PA'I 'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL GYI DRI MA YOD NA DPYOD LDAN RNAMS KYIS DAG THER MDZOD, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA GZHAN LA PHAN THOGS PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO'O, ,YI GE'I BYED PO BSKUL BA PO RANG NYID KYIS BRIS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAM WANTU,, ,,)
